1.0.name: wordpress/countdowndays
1.0.description:
CountDownDays - Plugin for counting down the event base the day. CountDownDays plugin is widgetable at your sidebar. Simple configuration, simple view, and friendly to every user.

If any problems or feedback please contact me http://www.nulis.web.id . The readme in the Indonesian language can be read in http://arisnb.nulis.web.id/count-down-days.html

Thanks to Purwedi Kurniawan.
